__e: How dare you like to me and make me look foolish? !
Have i said something- how dare you say to me that you're busy and suggest that i go around asking other men to take me here and there?
How dare you tell me my son is gay on the one day I'm trying to pretend I don't know?
"How dare you call me a fish!" You are, you know!
And you dare tell me that right to my face?
You dare to say such a thing to a man in his own home, as though all I have struggled to provide is not enough.
Have i said something- how dare you say to me that you're busy and suggest that i go around asking other men to take me here and there?
You dare to say such a thing to a man in his own home, as though all I have struggled to provide is not enough.
My father had only one child.
How dare you call me an idiot!
How dare you you to address me by my first name?
How dare you call me by my name!
I'll ask the young men to get ready before they all get dead drunk Young man, how dare you tell me these in front of the police station!
- Alone he/she wanted to know if still he/she remembered as making one confession correctly.
You dare bring me here to tell me... everything you don't want to do because of your fear? !
How dare you talk to me in the house of God.
Oh, God... how dare you speak to me like that, as much as I've done for you?
You don't even know me. How dare you talk to me like that.
How dare you talk to me like that, you son of a bitch?
How dare you speak so of a lady... any lady, let alone one you claim to love.
I don't order hits anymore. You insubordinate bastard!
How dare he talk to you rather than me?
How can you dare attempt to comment on my work, on my life, on me, and say nothing of family?
You made it, and no one dare speak to you about it any more;
When you're like me, Mr Carson, you have to read the signs as best you can because no one dares speak out.
And who's this woman that is interfering with our life
"How dare you make yourself fucking happy?
No, how dare you come here, after everything that you've done?

How dare you come here and tell me I don't understand.
All she's been through, and you dare to do this?
What the hell is going on? How dare they do this to me?
The thing no one else dares to do, that everyone says can't be done.
